data.name: Invadead
data.detailed_description: Invadead is a run n' gun first person shooter where you fight off hordes of zombies. You must always stay quick on your feet, as ammo on the powerfull guns quickly depletes and your health and stamina are mainly refreshed by pickpups found around the map. Remember to always use  each gun for it's purpose, and don't just stand around shooting everything with a pistol. Invadead features an arcade mode, where your goal is to survive through the most levels in one go to build a streak, as you and zombies gain in new abilities, but also it features a more streamlined campaign. The game is PC exclusive, and better played on a qwerty keyboard.
data.about_the_game: Invadead is a run n' gun first person shooter where you fight off hordes of zombies. You must always stay quick on your feet, as ammo on the powerfull guns quickly depletes and your health and stamina are mainly refreshed by pickpups found around the map. Remember to always use  each gun for it's purpose, and don't just stand around shooting everything with a pistol. Invadead features an arcade mode, where your goal is to survive through the most levels in one go to build a streak, as you and zombies gain in new abilities, but also it features a more streamlined campaign. The game is PC exclusive, and better played on a qwerty keyboard.
data.short_description: shoot at hordes of zombies using diffrent guns and grenades, epicly decimating them by your pure handsomeness.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2,00 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 520
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I5-4440 3,10 GHz
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX650
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
